name: #05 - Loop
description:
(Unmute Sound for Optimal Experience)

Fragment 05 - Loop
(From the BINARY EMOTIONS series)

"If we could go to the past and the future then we would no longer be the decision-maker of our lives. We are bound to follow that defined path and hence, trapped in a loop."

Loop: It's dedicated to Life being a loop of time. When you start you won't realize its importance, When you are running behind it, it almost ends". Each moment, you are being presented with two choices: Evolve or repeat. It is us who decide, whether to choose or for the time being blame it on circumstance.
--
"BINARY EMOTIONS" is a series based on 12 Single Edition Fragments in which the artist aims to translate his inner nuances within a specific moment into visuals that evoke certain emotions. An emotional journey digitized into a binary piece cataloged onto the blockchain.
